serums.overview: A hydrating serum that combines multiple types of hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 to provide multi-depth hydration and smooth skin texture. Perfect for all skin types needing hydration.
serums.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Ahnfeltia Concinna Extract, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Ethoxydiglycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin
serums.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Layer 2-3 times for extra hydration if needed
serums.whyEffective: Hyaluronic acid holds up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing intense hydration while vitamin B5 soothes skin.

serums.productName: CeraVe Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum
serums.overview: A brightening vitamin C serum that helps reduce dark spots and improve skin radiance while providing hydration and strengthening the skin barrier with ceramides.
serums.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Phosphate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide EOP, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum
serums.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Wait 1-2 minutes before next step, use AM only
serums.whyEffective: Vitamin C brightens skin and fades dark spots while hyaluronic acid provides hydration and ceramides strengthen the barrier.

serums.overview: A high-strength niacinamide serum that reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion while regulating oil production. Ideal for oily and acne-prone skin.
serums.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Zinc PCA, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin
serums.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin
Gently pat in with fingertips
Start once daily, can use AM and PM
serums.whyEffective: Niacinamide reduces inflammation and controls oil production while zinc provides additional antimicrobial benefits.

serums.overview: A lightweight hydrating toner that preps skin for better absorption of serums and moisturizers while providing immediate hydration with hyaluronic acid complex.
serums.ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Trehalose, Allantoin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Lactate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA
serums.howTo:
Pat onto skin after cleansing
Use 2–3 layers if skin is dehydrated
Allow each layer to fully absorb
serums.whyEffective: Hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 provide deep hydration while preparing skin for better absorption of subsequent products.

serums.overview: A glow-boosting serum that combines propolis and niacinamide to reduce inflammation, control oil production, and provide antioxidant protection for healthy-looking skin.
serums.ingredients: Propolis Extract, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Sodium Polyacrylate, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Laureth-7, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Adenosine
serums.howTo:
Apply 2–3 drops to face and neck
Pat in gently with fingertips
Layer thinnest to thickest consistency
serums.whyEffective: Propolis provides antioxidant protection while niacinamide reduces inflammation and controls oil for a healthy glow.
